snippet: Russia secured a quarterfinals berth at the ice hockey world championship with a 4-1 win over Latvia on Saturday to remain unbeaten.
lead_paragraph: Russia secured a quarterfinals berth at the ice hockey world championship with a 4-1 win over Latvia on Saturday to remain unbeaten.

headline.main: Unbeaten Russia Advances to World Championship Quarterfinals
headline.print_headline: Unbeaten Russia reach world ice hockey quarters
